text: haey( chaur changcha) nowpel del mcheasa robsa puok anak ban brakeasa tha brakd nasa brasenbae puok anak doengkoun( nouv nie k- meat robsa yeung) yeung pitchea nung banthem( kar braosa bratan)dl puok anak tiet . bo nde brasenbae puok anak rmilkoun vinh noh pitabrakd nasa tearounakamm robsa yeung ku thngonthngor bamphot
